Name: 天外武林 (Traveler of Wuxia)
About the game: Traveler of Wuxia is a deck-buiding roguelite game which combine the plot twist from the wuxia novel and the variety of martial arts. Through this game, you can explore a wuxia world that you never experience. DeckBuilder and ComboHit There are hundreds of cards in this big wuxia world. It will be hard to learn all of it, so you better choose wisely. In every adventure, you will find new event and new martial arts move to discover. With the cards be find, you will find out the hidden combo between different cards. Only the true master who learn the martial arts combo, can be the champion of the wuxia world. Memorable Teammates In this chaotic world, the young hero needs to find the lost relic. It's a hard hard trip, but you will find teammates with different feature. Learning your teammates moves, might let the battle be more easy. Various Event and Characters In the wuxia world of Heluo, hundreds of mysterious events and various kind of people waiting you to explore. You have to make hard decision which influence live and death. But beware, your teammates might have their own thoughts. Death is only the Beginning To the hero who has the blessed, death is not the end but only the beginning. By the blessed, you will be stronger after each death, even bring something back that can influence your next adventure.
Developers: 香港商河洛互動娛樂股份有限公司
Publishers: 香港商河洛互動娛樂股份有限公司
